item.title: 独家报道：欧盟航空监管机构希望美国联邦航空局加入飞机审计行列
item.description: 欧洲航空监管机构负责人周二告诉路透社，该机构将于下周建议美国联邦航空管理局（FAA）加入对该地区空客飞机的安全审计。【原文：Europe's aviation regulator will propose next week that its counterpart the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) joins its safety audits of Airbus planes in the region, its chief told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华尔街期货因担心经济增长乏力而下滑
item.description: 在疲软的制造业数据引发人们对美国经济实力的新担忧之后，美国股市期货周二下跌，尽管市场正在等待本周的一系列报告来衡量经济增长放缓的程度。【原文：U.S. stock futures fell on Tuesday after weak manufacturing data raised new worries about the strength of the U.S. economy, even as markets awaited a slew of reports this week to gauge how much growth has slowed.】

item.title: 沃尔沃将在欧盟规则出台前签发全球首张电动汽车电池护照
item.description: 瑞典汽车制造商沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）向路透社透露，该公司正在推出全球首个电动汽车电池护照，记录其即将投产的旗舰车型 EX90 SUV 的原材料来源、组件、可回收成分和碳足迹。【原文：Volvo Cars is launching the world's first EV battery passport recording the origins of raw materials, components, recycled content and carbon footprint for its flagship EX90 SUV, which is about to start production, the Swedish automaker told Reuters.】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司联席首席执行官将向股东阐述公司战略
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司新任命的联席首席执行官预计将于周二与股东讨论他们对这家媒体集团的愿景，而公司的控股股东正在评估公司与 Skydance Media 合并的事宜。【原文：Paramount Global's newly appointed co-CEOs are expected to discuss their vision for the media conglomerate with shareholders on Tuesday, even as the company's controlling shareholder evaluates merging the company with Skydance Media.】

item.title: 美国 由于利率、美元和石油下滑，华尔街的增长喘不过气来
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 聚焦：所有作物价格下滑，美国农民选择大豆以减少损失
item.description: 今年春天，马克-塔特尔（Mark Tuttle）在伊利诺伊州北部的农场里种植了更多的大豆和更少的玉米，因为这两种作物的价格都徘徊在三年来的低点附近，而大豆较低的生产成本为他提供了在美国第一大豆生产州实现盈利的最佳机会。【原文：Mark Tuttle planted more soy and less corn on his northern Illinois farm this spring as prices for both crops hover near three-year lows and soybeans' lower production costs offered him the best chance of turning a profit in the country's top soy producing state.】

item.title: 咆哮凯蒂猫的 GameStop 选择权价值数百万美元，但套现可能很困难
item.description: "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "基思-吉尔（Keith Gill）是 2021 年 meme 股票狂潮背后的股票影响者，他在 GameStop 期权持仓上可能坐拥数千万美元的纸面利润，但要获得这些收益可能并不容易。【原文："Roaring Kitty" Keith Gill, the stock influencer behind the 2021 meme stock frenzy, may be sitting on a paper profit of tens of millions of dollars on his position in GameStop options, but reaping those gains might not be easy.】

item.title: 国泰航空首席执行官表示将增加更多 "一带一路 "目的地
item.description: 国泰航空公司首席执行官林荣福周日表示，在今年晚些时候开通前往利雅得的新航线后，该公司正寻求在中国的 "一带一路 "项目中增加更多目的地。【原文：Airline Cathay Pacific is looking to add more destinations on China's Belt and Road project, CEO Ronald Lam said on Sunday, after a new route to Riyadh starts up later this year.】

item.title: 丰田因发动机可能熄火召回逾 10 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周二表示，丰田将在美国召回10万多辆SUV和皮卡，原因是发动机内的碎片可能导致发动机熄火。【原文：Toyota will recall over 100,000 SUVs and pickup trucks in the U.S. over debris in the engine potentially causing it to stall, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉投资者挪威KLP公司将在电动汽车制造商年会上支持集体谈判动议
item.description: 特斯拉投资者、挪威最大的养老基金KLP将对一项股东提案投赞成票，该提案敦促这家美国电动汽车制造商在瑞典继续面临工业行动之际，参与工资和其他劳资谈判。【原文：Tesla investor KLP, Norway's largest pension fund, will vote in favour of a shareholder proposal urging the U.S. electric vehicle maker to engage in wage and other labour negotiations as it continues to face industrial action in Sweden.】

item.title: 澳航首席执行官相信波音公司将解决质量问题
item.description: 澳航首席执行官周二表示，她相信波音公司会解决这家美国飞机制造商的质量问题，这些问题已使公司陷入危机。【原文：The Qantas chief executive said on Tuesday she was confident Boeing would address the quality issues at the American planemaker, which have plunged the company into a crisis.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，空中客车公司正在洽谈向中国航空公司出售 100 多架宽体喷气式飞机事宜
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，空中客车公司（Airbus SE）正在就向中国出售A330neo飞机的重大事宜进行谈判，中国一些最大的航空公司正在考虑购买100多架升级版A330飞机。【原文：Airbus SE is negotiating a major sale of A330neo aircraft to China, with some of the largest Chinese airlines considering buying more than 100 of the upgraded A330 models, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉中国产电动汽车 5 月销量同比下降 6.6
item.description: 中国乘用车联席会（CPCA）周二公布的数据显示，5月份美国汽车制造商特斯拉在中国生产的电动汽车销量同比下降6.6%，至72573辆。【原文：U.S. automaker Tesla's sales of China-made electric vehicles dropped 6.6% from a year earlier to 72,573 units in May, data from the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本央行副行长绯野表示，必须警惕日元对经济的影响
item.description: 日本央行副行长绯野良造（Ryozo Himino）表示，央行必须对日元走势可能对经济产生的影响保持 "高度警惕"，并暗示日元疲软将是影响央行下次加息时间的因素之一。【原文：Bank of Japan Deputy Governor Ryozo Himino said the central bank must be "very vigilant" to the impact the yen's moves could have on the economy, suggesting the currency's weakness will be among factors affecting the timing of its next interest rate hike.】

item.title: 债权人对违约的中国开发商国有股东提起诉讼
item.description: 据一份法庭文件和一位熟悉此事的消息人士称，中国南城的一群债权人已在香港对该开发商的最大国有股东提起诉讼，要求收回 14 亿美元。【原文：A group of creditors of China South City has filed a lawsuit in Hong Kong against the developer's biggest state-owned shareholder to recover $1.4 billion, according to a court filing and a source familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士金融监管机构希望能够点名羞辱银行
item.description: 瑞士金融监管局（FINMA）首席执行官斯特凡-瓦尔特（Stefan Walter）周二在接受《NZZ》报采访时表示，瑞士金融监管局希望能够点名批评违反其规定的银行。【原文：Swiss financial regulator FINMA wants to be able to name and shame banks which breach its rules, Chief Executive Stefan Walter told newspaper NZZ in an interview published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德意志银行与 Bitpanda 合作，"谨慎 "转向加密货币
item.description: 两家公司告诉路透社，德意志银行将与 Bitpanda 合作，为这家奥地利加密货币交易所处理客户的存款和取款。【原文：Deutsche Bank will work with Bitpanda to process customer deposits and withdrawals for the Austrian crypto exchange, the companies told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示：越南因存款外流扩大大规模银行救援行动
item.description: 据路透社看到的一份银行文件显示，越南中央银行在过去两个月中又向陷入困境的西贡股份制商业银行贷款 12 亿美元，使贷款总额达到 245 亿美元，这是该银行拯救储户努力的一部分。【原文：Vietnam's central bank lent another $1.2 billion to ailing Saigon Joint Stock Commercial Bank over the last two months, according to a bank document seen by Reuters, taking the total to $24.5 billion as part of its efforts to rescue depositors.】

item.title: 瑞银将摩根士丹利资本国际 AC 世界指数 2024 年底的预期上调至 830 点
item.description: 瑞银周二将MSCI全球指数（MSCI All Country (AC) World）2024年底的预期从800点上调至830点，理由是股票风险偏好改善、对人工智能的乐观情绪以及美国工资增长可能放缓。【原文：UBS raised its year-end 2024 forecast for the MSCI All Country (AC) World index to 830 from 800 on Tuesday, citing improving equity risk appetite, optimism around artificial intelligence and a potential slowing of U.S. wage growth.】

item.title: 中国看到了房地产的一线希望，但无法摆脱与日本的比较
item.description: 中国新屋开工率骤降，使人们更加希望饱受打击的房地产行业最终能摆脱长期供过于求的局面，但清理不良资产的政策缺失却使人们对类似日本停滞的担忧持续存在。【原文：A plunge in China's new housing construction is fuelling hopes the battered property sector is finally coming to terms with chronic oversupply, but a clean-up of bad assets is the missing policy piece that keeps Japan-like stagnation fears alive.】

item.title: 解说员：中国保障性住房政策的主要特点
item.description: 中国政策制定者上个月公布了一系列支持房地产行业的措施，包括要求地方政府购买 "部分 "未售出的公寓，并将其改造成经济适用房。【原文：Chinese policymakers last month unveiled a slew of support measures for the property sector, including a nod to local governments to buy "some" unsold apartments and turn them into affordable housing.】

item.title: 早间竞价：茫然的美元将面临更多宏观冲击？
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 台积电称曾讨论过将晶圆厂迁出台湾，但这是不可能的
item.description: 台湾合约芯片制造商台积电的主要客户包括英伟达（Nvidia）和苹果公司，该公司周二表示，由于与中国的紧张关系日益加剧，该公司已与一些客户就将芯片工厂迁出岛外进行了谈判，但这是不可能的。【原文：Taiwanese contract chipmaker TSMC , whose major clients include Nvidia and Apple, said on Tuesday it had held talks with some customers about moving its chip plants off the island as tensions mounted with China but such a move would be impossible.】

item.title: 英特尔推出新型数据中心芯片与 AMD 展开竞争
item.description: 英特尔周二推出了新一代至强服务器处理器，希望夺回数据中心市场份额，并透露其高迪 3 人工智能加速器芯片的价格将大大低于竞争对手的芯片。【原文：Intel launched its next generation Xeon server processors on Tuesday as it looks to claw back data center market share and revealed that its Gaudi 3 artificial intelligence accelerator chips would be priced much lower than its rivals' chips.】

item.title: 日本当局就认证违规问题检查丰田总部
item.description: 在丰田汽车某些车型的认证申请中发现违规行为后，日本交通部官员于本周二对丰田汽车总部展开了现场调查。【原文：Officials from Japan's transport ministry launched an on-site investigation at Toyota Motor's headquarters on Tuesday after irregularities were found in its applications to certify certain models.】

item.title: 投资者质疑美国经济实力，亚洲股市回落
item.description: 由于全球最大经济体的制造业活动进一步疲软，全球投资者考虑到美国经济的 "特殊性 "开始松动的前景，周二亚洲股市温和走软。【原文：Asian share markets were mildly weaker on Tuesday as global investors consider the prospect the U.S. economy's 'exceptionalism' is starting to unwind as manufacturing activity in the world's largest economy further weakened.】

item.title: 美国参议员敦促 FAA 确保波音质量计划中的问责制
item.description: 一位负责航空事务的美国参议员周一敦促联邦航空管理局局长要求波音公司在质量扭亏为盈工作中保持透明度和问责制。【原文：A U.S. senator overseeing aviation issues on Monday urged the head of the Federal Aviation Administration to require transparency and accountability in Boeing's quality turnaround effort.】

item.title: 美联储减息押注增加，美元跌至数月低点
item.description: 美元兑欧元和英镑周二跌至四月份以来的最低点，原因是美国经济疲软的迹象增强了美联储提前降息的理由。【原文：The dollar languished at its lowest since April against the euro and sterling on Tuesday as signs of a softening U.S. economy boosted the case for earlier Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 俄勒冈州陪审团称，J&J公司必须在最新的滑石粉审判中支付2.6亿美元
item.description: 周一，陪审团裁定，强生公司必须为一名俄勒冈州妇女因吸入该公司生产的滑石粉而患间皮瘤一案支付 2.6 亿美元。【原文：Johnson & Johnson must pay $260 million in the case of an Oregon woman who said she got mesothelioma from inhaling the company's talc powder, a jury found on Monday.】

item.title: 油价跌幅扩大，因担心 2024 年晚些时候供应增加
item.description: 周二早盘，油价有所回落，延续了上一交易日跌至四个月来最低点时的跌势，原因是投资者担心今年晚些时候供应量会增加。【原文：Oil prices eased in early trade on Tuesday, extending their losses from the previous session when prices fell to their lowest in four months, as investors worried about supply ticking up later in the year.】
